item.description:
Hi, I’m Christopher Valle! I’m a researcher, statistician, and software engineer. Although my primary area of research is educational psychology, I enjoy discovering and working on problems in a variety of discplines, including healthcare, artificial intelligence, and computational statistics. Currently, I’m involved in answering interesting questions in healthcare.

For my daily professional endeavors, I’m a research and development software engineer at 3M Health Information Systems. At 3M, I develop software and conduct statistical analyses of inpatient (e.g., admissions to a hospital) and outpatient (e.g., medical treatment without a hospital admission) measures related to the 3M Performance Matrix Platform.
